summary: Enthusiastic artist with experience in traditional and digital art; former digital media specialist; currently a substitute teacher for Chesterfield County Schools; strong design sense, attention to detail, time management, and photography.

experience.title: Substitute Teacher
experience.description: Work in schools across Chesterfield County in a variety of subjects and grades. Favorites include Art, Library and History. Follow lesson plans and guide students through activities, providing explanations as needed. Comfortable with unexpected school situations; quick on my feet and calm, helping to keep students calm.

experience.title: Digital Media Specialist and Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Met and worked with grieving families to create personalized memorial packages. Used Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Publisher and funeral stationery software. Created large collage boards for families; supported outreach programs; designed pamphlets and printed materials for events. Trained coworkers on new software and troubleshooted computer and printer problems.

experience.title: Summer Counselor
experience.description: Helped plan and execute activities; handled minor injuries; wrote incident reports; involved in conflict resolution and support for children including military families and those with special needs.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts; Dual Major: Art and Visual Technology & Anthropology
